name: Rick Lancer

topics.response_text: Hey! Yeah you! Come give us a hand!
Take down this password, it'll get you into the Overseer's area upstairs I think.
We were part of a caravan heading into New Vegas from down south. They are holding us hostage, trying to get some ransom.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I'll see what I can do.
topics.response_text: Thanks partner. I think the Fiend with the key is back in one of the bedrooms somewhere, someone called him Daniel. If that helps.

topics.topic_text: I need to know a little more about Vault 3.
topics.response_text: I don't know much, only that the people who lived in here originally were killed by the Fiends. Carter there escaped and managed to explore for a bit.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me about the Fiends?
topics.response_text: They are a bunch of junkies that do whatever they can to get money for chems.

topics.topic_text: If I help you escape, will you give me the password he found?
topics.response_text: Yeah, it is yours if you help us out of here.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I don't have time to help you out.
topics.response_text: We are going to die in here. Please, if you find the key let us out. We'll find our own way to safety.

topics.topic_text: Give me the password he found, and I'll help you escape.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Help us first, then we'll give you the password, and don't think about killing me. Its all in my head.

topics.topic_text: I have a couple more questions.
topics.response_text: Okay, but be quiet. I don't want the Fiends to hear us.

topics.topic_text: Can you make it worth my while?
topics.response_text: I don't know. Carter told me about some password he hacked out of a computer. I could give it to you, if you help us out.

description:
Rick Lancer is a 28 year-old Hispanic Male.

A resourceful Hispanic man in his late 20s, Rick Lancer bears the hardened look of someone who has survived the harsh realities of the wasteland. His clothes are worn but practical, with a few makeshift repairs visible. Despite his imprisonment, he maintains a determined posture, his eyes constantly scanning his surroundings for any opportunity.

Rick Lancer's Personality: Resourceful, cautious, and resilient. Rick is a natural survivor who thinks quickly under pressure. He values loyalty but understands the need for self-preservation in the wasteland. While generally good-natured, his time in the Mojave has made him somewhat distrustful of strangers.

Rick Lancer's Backstory: Born in the Hub, Rick grew up hearing stories of the legendary New Vegas and the opportunities it offered. As a young adult, he joined a caravan company, seeking adventure and fortune in the Mojave Wasteland. For years, he traveled between settlements, learning the ways of the wasteland and developing skills in survival and bartering. By 2281, he had saved enough to consider settling down, but fate had other plans when his caravan was attacked by the Fiends.
